channel.title: Film and TV Music News on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Film and TV Music News on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ Soundtrack Announces Release Date and Tracklist Including New Original Songs
item.description: The sequel soundtrack, which covers the stage musical’s second act, features a new song from both Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, along with never-before-released “The Wicked Witch of the East."

item.title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ Soundtrack Announces Release Date and Tracklist Including New Original Songs
item.description: The sequel soundtrack, which covers the stage musical’s second act, features a new song from both Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, along with never-before-released “The Wicked Witch of the East."

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack Finally Hits No. 1
item.description: The Netflix film’s soundtrack has topped the Billboard 200 chart, nearly three months after its release.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack Finally Hits No. 1
item.description: The Netflix film’s soundtrack has topped the Billboard 200 chart, nearly three months after its release.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Singers EJAE, Rei Ami and Audrey Nuna Present at 2025 VMAs
item.description: The singing voices behind the summer’s biggest hit, “Golden,” took to the stage to present the album of the year award.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Singers EJAE, Rei Ami and Audrey Nuna Present at 2025 VMAs
item.description: The singing voices behind the summer’s biggest hit, “Golden,” took to the stage to present the album of the year award.

item.title: How The Sphere Remade ‘The Wizard of Oz’s’ Famous Score: “All the Numbers Have to Sparkle”
item.description: Veteran composer David Newman was tapped to re-record the entire score with a live orchestra.

item.title: How The Sphere Remade ‘The Wizard of Oz’s’ Famous Score: “All the Numbers Have to Sparkle”
item.description: Veteran composer David Newman was tapped to re-record the entire score with a live orchestra.

item.title: Paul McCartney Documentary ‘Man on the Run’ Picked Up by Amazon MGM Ahead of Telluride Debut (Exclusive)
item.description: Morgan Neville, who previously directed ‘20 Feet from Stardom’ and last year’s ‘Piece by Piece,’ chronicles McCartney’s post-Beatles 1970s era.

item.title: Paul McCartney Documentary ‘Man on the Run’ Picked Up by Amazon MGM Ahead of Telluride Debut (Exclusive)
item.description: Morgan Neville, who previously directed ‘20 Feet from Stardom’ and last year’s ‘Piece by Piece,’ chronicles McCartney’s post-Beatles 1970s era.

item.title: Heart’s Ann Wilson Gets New Documentary ‘In My Voice’ (Exclusive)
item.description: “This film is my story in my own words, told the way I’ve always wanted to tell it,” Wilson said in a statement Thursday.

item.title: Heart’s Ann Wilson Gets New Documentary ‘In My Voice’ (Exclusive)
item.description: “This film is my story in my own words, told the way I’ve always wanted to tell it,” Wilson said in a statement Thursday.

item.title: Does John Williams Really Dislike Film Music? It’s More Complicated Than That
item.description: Williams biographer Tim Greiving writes that recent headlines quoting the famed composer don’t tell the full story.
